downloader.object

Class DownloadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • downloader.object.DownloadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DownloadThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    Task is separated to parts according to thread number set by user.Download thread stand for each part which run in its own thread and download data to its own file.
    Author:
    Moon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DownloadThread

        public DownloadThread(Task task,
              int begin,
              int end,
              int id)
        Constructs this class according specified task , beginning point, end point and ID(ID only used for debug).
        Parameters:
        task - Task this thread derives from.
        begin - Beginning point of file.
        end - End point of file.
        id - Thread ID.
